sentences.en: A united effort is always more effective than an isolated complaint.
sentences.cn: 联合行动总是比单个人抱怨更有效。

sentences.en: Eczema is a common skin complaint which often runs in families.
sentences.cn: 湿疹是一种常见的皮肤病，通常具遗传性。

sentences.en: He bore the pain without a word of complaint.
sentences.cn: 他一声不吭地忍住了疼痛.

sentences.en: He is having treatment for a chest complaint.
sentences.cn: 他在接受胸部疾病的治疗。

sentences.en: Her thin voice rose high in complaint.
sentences.cn: 她抱怨时抬高了尖细的嗓音。

sentences.en: His complaint causes dizziness and nausea.
sentences.cn: 他的病引起了头晕和恶心。

sentences.en: If you have a complaint you should tell me outright.
sentences.cn: 如果你有不满意的事,你应该直率地对我说.

sentences.en: If you have any complaint, don't just sulk ; speak up.
sentences.cn: 你有意见提出来, 不要闹 意气.

sentences.en: If you wish to make a complaint, you should see the manager.
sentences.cn: 如果你要投诉，应该去找经理。

sentences.en: Our neighbours lodged a complaint against us with the police.
sentences.cn: 我们的邻居向警方控告我们.

sentences.en: People have been reluctant to make formal complaints to the police.
sentences.cn: 人们一直不愿正式向警方投诉。

sentences.en: Seeing how cleverly he had been outwitted he made no complaint.
sentences.cn: 看到自己在计谋上完全不是对手，他甘拜下风。

sentences.en: She expressed her disgust at the programme by writing a letter of complaint.
sentences.cn: 她写了封投诉信，表示对这个节目的反感。

sentences.en: The action he takes varies according to the nature of the complaint.
sentences.cn: 他所采取的行动,根据怨言的性质,而有所不同.

sentences.en: The burden of his complaint was that quality was very poor.
sentences.cn: 他投诉的要点是品质非常差.

sentences.en: The most common complaint is about poor service.
sentences.cn: 最常见的投诉与服务差有关。

sentences.en: The sales assistants are trained to deal with customer complaints in a friendly manner.
sentences.cn: 售货员都受过培训，要以友好的态度处理顾客的投诉。

sentences.en: There's been a record number of complaints about the standard of service.
sentences.cn: 已有对服务水准的创纪录数量的投诉。

sentences.en: This is a cause of complaint.
sentences.cn: 这是抱怨的原因.

sentences.en: We have been bombarded with letters of complaint.
sentences.cn: 我们接二连三收到了大批的投诉信件。

words.tran_cn: 抱怨地；发牢骚地；诉苦地
[法] 原告；发牢骚的人；抱怨者

trans.tran_en: a statement in which someone complains about something
